spans.content: \lim_{x\to 0}\frac{3\sin x + x^2\cos\frac{1}{x}}{(1 + \cos x)\ln(1 + x)} = \frac{1}{2}\lim_{x\to 0}\frac{3\sin x + x^2\cos\frac{1}{x}}{\ln(1 + x)} = \frac{1}{2}\lim_{x\to 0}\frac{3\sin x + x^2\cos\frac{1}{x}}{x}
【解】 对数螺线的参数方程为
故所求切线的直角坐标方程为
P \left(A _ {1}\right) = \frac {2}{5}, \quad P \left(A _ {2}\right) = \frac {3}{5}, \quad P \left(B \mid A _ {1}\right) = \frac {1 9}{4 9}, \quad P \left(B \mid A _ {2}\right) = \frac {2 0}{4 9},
【解】 由周期函数定积分的平移性质得

\begin{array}{l} F (x) = \int_ {- \pi} ^ {\pi} \mathrm {e} ^ {\sin t} \sin t \mathrm {d} t = \int_ {0} ^ {\pi} [ \mathrm {e} ^ {\sin t} \sin t + \mathrm {e} ^ {\sin (- t)} \sin (- t) ] \mathrm {d} t \\ = \int_ {0} ^ {\pi} \left(\mathrm {e} ^ {\sin t} - \mathrm {e} ^ {- \sin t}\right) \sin t \mathrm {d} t, \\ \end{array}
【解】三条直线交于一点的充分必要条件是方程组
\left\{ \begin{array}{l} a_{1}x + b_{1}y = -c_{1}, \\ a_{2}x + b_{2}y = -c_{2}, \\ a_{3}x + b_{3}y = -c_{3} \end{array} \right.
\mathbf{A} = \begin{pmatrix} a_1 & b_1 \\ a_2 & b_2 \\ a_3 & b_3 \end{pmatrix}, \overline{\mathbf{A}} = \begin{pmatrix} a_1 & b_1 & -c_1 \\ a_2 & b_2 & -c_2 \\ a_3 & b_3 & -c_3 \end{pmatrix}
轴旋转一周形成的曲面为
C:\left\{ \begin{array}{ll}x = \cos t,\\ y = \sin t,\\ z = 2 - \cos t + \sin t \end{array} \right.

\begin{array}{l} \int_ {C} (z - y) \mathrm {d} x + (x - z) \mathrm {d} y + (x - y) \mathrm {d} z \\ = \int_ {2 \pi} ^ {0} (2 - \cos t) (- \sin t) d t + (2 \cos t - 2 - \sin t) \cos t d t + (\cos t - \sin t) (\sin t + \cos t) d t \\ = \int_ {2 \pi} ^ {0} (3 \cos^ {2} t - \sin^ {2} t - 2 \sin t - 2 \cos t) d t \\ = - 3 \int_ {0} ^ {2 \pi} \cos^ {2} t d t + \int_ {0} ^ {2 \pi} \sin^ {2} t d t = - 1 2 \int_ {0} ^ {\frac {\pi}{2}} \cos^ {2} t d t + 4 \int_ {0} ^ {\frac {\pi}{2}} \sin^ {2} t d t \\ = - 8 \times \frac {1}{2} \times \frac {\pi}{2} = - 2 \pi . \\ \end{array}

\begin{array}{l} \int_ {C} (z - y) \mathrm {d} x + (x - z) \mathrm {d} y + (x - y) \mathrm {d} z = \frac {1}{\sqrt {3}} \iint_ {\Sigma} \left| \begin{array}{c c c} - 1 & 1 & - 1 \\ \frac {\partial}{\partial x} & \frac {\partial}{\partial y} & \frac {\partial}{\partial z} \\ z - y & x - z & x - y \end{array} \right| \mathrm {d} S = - \frac {2}{\sqrt {3}} \iint_ {\Sigma} \mathrm {d} S \\ = - \frac {2}{\sqrt {3}} \iint_ {x ^ {2} + y ^ {2} \leqslant 1} \sqrt {1 + \left(\frac {\partial z}{\partial x}\right) ^ {2} + \left(\frac {\partial z}{\partial y}\right) ^ {2}} d x d y \\ = - 2 \iint_ {x ^ {2} + y ^ {2} \leqslant 1} d x d y = - 2 \pi . \\ \end{array}

\frac {\partial^ {2} z}{\partial x ^ {2}} = f ^ {\prime \prime} (e ^ {x} \sin y) (e ^ {x} \sin y) ^ {2} + f ^ {\prime} (e ^ {x} \sin y) e ^ {x} \sin y,
